languages.text: "Думай, что говоришь. Такое признание звучит опасно близко к ереси".
"You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."
languages.original_text: "Думай, что говоришь. Такое признание звучит опасно близко к ереси".

traits.locale_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. A confession like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."
"You should consider your words more carefully. A confession like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."
"You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."
"You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."
"You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

languages.text: 「発言にはもっと気をつけた方がいい。そういった告白は危険なほど異端寄りに聞こえる」
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「発言にはもっと気をつけた方がいい。そういった告白は危険なほど異端寄りに聞こえる」

languages.text: “说话应该更谨慎些。你这样的坦白，听起来几乎像是异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: “说话应该更谨慎些。你这样的坦白，听起来几乎像是异端邪说。”

languages.text: «Será mejor que cuide sus palabras. Una afirmación como esa buenamente podría considerarse herejía».
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Será mejor que cuide sus palabras. Una afirmación como esa buenamente podría considerarse herejía».

languages.text: « Vous devriez faire plus attention à ce que vous dites. Ce genre d'aveu se rapproche un peu trop de l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez faire plus attention à ce que vous dites. Ce genre d'aveu se rapproche un peu trop de l'hérésie. »

languages.text: "Ihr solltet Eure Worte bedachtsamer wählen. Ein derartiges Eingeständnis klingt gefährlich stark nach Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet Eure Worte bedachtsamer wählen. Ein derartiges Eingeständnis klingt gefährlich stark nach Ketzerei."

languages.text: "Sözlerini daha dikkatli seçmeni öneririm. İtirafının raddesi biraz kaysa kulağa kâfirlik olarak gelebilir."
languages.original_text: "You should consider your words more carefully. An admission like that sounds dangerously close to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerini daha dikkatli seç. İtirafın kulağa raddesi biraz kaysa kâfirlik olacakmış gibi geliyor."
